oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thomas R. Stedman Certificate of Eligibility for the Southern Cross of Honor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certificate of Eligibility for Thomas R. Stedman for the Southern Cross of Honor bestowed by the United Daughters of the Confederacy. Stedman served as a private in Co. D, 41st Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. The original is in the collections of the Lincoln County Archives.
